metadata.title: CVE-2021-26927 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in jasper before 2.0.25. A null pointer dereference injp2_decode in jp2_dec.c may lead to program crash and denial of service.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
